trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de opties die kunnen worden ingesteld voor een <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>wordt gebruikt voor het genereren van XSD-schema's van een type of ongeldige assembly.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.
trans-unit.target: U kunt ook de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>genereren [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code uit een schemadocument.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]importeren en exporteren van schema's, Zie [Schema importeren en exporteren](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) en [schema's exporteren van klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>eigenschap wordt gebruikt door de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>om op te nemen die kan worden gelezen in een objectgrafiek.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Zie de gegevenscontract en bekende typen [bekend van gegevenscontracttypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van een vervanging voor serialisatie.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: Een implementatie van de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"> </xref> interface die kan worden gebruikt om aan te passen hoe een XML-schema-weergave voor een specifiek type wordt geÃ«xporteerd.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee haalt u de verzameling van typen die tijdens het serialiseren of deserialiseren optreden kunnen.

trans-unit.source: The KnownTypes property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property).
trans-unit.target: De eigenschap KnownTypes wordt gebruikt door de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>om op te nemen die kan worden gelezen in een objectgrafiek (ingesteld met de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Zie de gegevenscontract en bekende typen [bekend van gegevenscontracttypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""></xref> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""> </xref> verzameling met typen die tijdens het serialiseren of deserialiseren optreden kunnen.

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-schema verklaringen worden geÃ«xporteerd voor alle typen die zijn opgegeven in deze verzameling door de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>.
